markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Unremarkable](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=361)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 75 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

Your face is particularly unremarkable, even if your presence or actions may not be. You know how to use this to your advantage, making it difficult for people to identify and collect information about you.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Wisdom
or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) skill, and the [Acting Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Lengthy Diversion](/Feats.aspx?ID=810) skill feat.
name: Unremarkable

You know how to use this to your advantage, making it difficult for people to identify and collect information about you. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Wisdom or Charisma, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Deception skill, and the Acting Lore skill. You gain the Lengthy Diversion skill feat.
